meanings.definition: A type of melon with sweet, juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: I love eating honeydews for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had fresh honeydews on sale.
meanings.sent3: The honeydews were so sweet, they made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a slice of honeydew.
meanings.sent5: The honeydews were like little drops of happiness in a bowl.

meanings.definition: A light green color resembling that of a honeydew melon.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely honeydews shade.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed blue and yellow to create a honeydews hue.
meanings.sent3: The honeydews color of the walls made the room feel calm.
meanings.sent4: The fields outside were a sea of honeydews under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The dress she wore was a beautiful honeydews color.
